legacy.full_text: Hong Kong is one of the topics on the agenda of this year’s two sessions. I sat down with Huang Ping, a member of China's top political advisory body on Hong Kong’s electoral system,  the development of the Greater Bay Area, and the fight against COVID-19.

legacy.description: TV News Reporter and Bilingual Presenter
legacy.name: Su Yuting 苏钰婷

text.text: This Post is from a suspended account. Learn more

legacy.full_text: "The very aim of reforming the electoral system is to make sure the members who will be elected either as Legislative Council members or as administration officials are not the ones who may run for the so-called “illegal actions for justice”. CPPCC Member Huang Ping said.

legacy.description: TV News Reporter and Bilingual Presenter
legacy.name: Su Yuting 苏钰婷

legacy.full_text: Guo Weimin, spokesperson of the fourth session of the 13th CPPCC National Committee, is briefing journalists on the session and taking questions. The press conference is held via video link due to the COVID-19 prevention and control requirements. https://t.co/ddSiESvQil

legacy.full_text: Today, across China and around the world, millions of people celebrate Lantern Festival. It is the last day of the Chinese New Year celebrations, the 15th day of the first lunar month.I take a photo of the moon by my cellphone,wishing you all the best and all dreams come true. https://t.co/NuuLct6B82
